接口的使用
org.apache.catalina.SessionListener

  • 使用SessionListener的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.authenticator
    This package contains Authenticator implementations for the various supported authentication methods (BASIC, DIGEST, and FORM).
    org.apache.catalina.ha.authenticator  
    org.apache.catalina.ha.session  
    org.apache.catalina.manager  
    org.apache.catalina.session
    This package contains the standard Manager and Session implementations that represent the collection of active sessions and the individual sessions themselves, respectively, that are associated with a Context.

    • org.apache.catalina中SessionListener的使用

      参数类型为SessionListener的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Session.addSessionListener(SessionListener listener)
      Add a session event listener to this component.
      void Session.removeSessionListener(SessionListener listener)
      Remove a session event listener from this component.

    • org.apache.catalina.ha.authenticator中SessionListener的使用

      实现SessionListener的org.apache.catalina.ha.authenticator中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ClusterSingleSignOnListener
      Cluster extension of SingleSignOnListener that simply adds the marker interface ReplicatedSessionListener which allows the listener to be replicated across the cluster along with the session.
      返回SessionListener的org.apache.catalina.ha.authenticator中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected SessionListener ClusterSingleSignOn.getSessionListener(java.lang.String ssoId) 

    • org.apache.catalina.ha.session中SessionListener的使用

      org.apache.catalina.ha.session中SessionListener的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  ReplicatedSessionListener
      This is a marker interface used to indicate an implementation of SessionListener that should be replicated with the session across the cluster.
      参数类型为SessionListener的org.apache.catalina.ha.session中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void DeltaSession.addSessionListener(SessionListener listener) 
      void DeltaRequest.addSessionListener(SessionListener listener) 
      void DeltaSession.addSessionListener(SessionListener listener, boolean addDeltaRequest) 
      void DeltaSession.removeSessionListener(SessionListener listener) 
      void DeltaRequest.removeSessionListener(SessionListener listener) 
      void DeltaSession.removeSessionListener(SessionListener listener, boolean addDeltaRequest)
